title: Storm Preparedness Planning
description: A major hurricane is forecast to make landfall in the service territory in 3 days. The utility needs to prepare its response.

tasks.description: Run a predictive outage model based on the hurricane's forecast track and intensity to estimate the potential number of customer outages.
Secure external resources by activating mutual assistance agreements with other utilities to bring in extra line crews.
tasks.expected_outcome: System sends requests and tracks responses from 10 neighboring utilities.

tasks.description: Pre-position crews and materials at staging areas just outside the storm's expected impact zone.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates plans for optimal staging area locations.
